title: Did Farrell Williams send President Trump a letter 'His happy song' to stop and forget?
subtitle: The writer and producer criticized the president for playing the song after a mass shooting at the church in Pittsburgh, but Trump was not responsible for choosing music.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The lawyers for Farrell Williams sent a letter to Donald Trump, "Stop and Stop," after the president played "Said" before a speech on October 27.
